p: As can be seen from Figure 6, PTOP exhibited a higher T onset than PTOSi, which was attributed to the low temperature of the initial DPSD degradation. Moreover, its T max was higher than that of PTOSi, while the residue yield of PTOP was less than that of PTOSi. Silicon retained in the chemical bond could be acted as a barrier that prevents the transfer of heat and mass in the condensed phase [ 30]. These results indicate that the thermal property of PTOP is higher than that of PTOSi.
